properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Spacious four bedroom detached house located in a quiet residential area. The property offers a large living room, modern fitted kitchen with dining area, separate utility room and downstairs WC. Upstairs features four well-sized bedrooms including a master bedroom with en-suite, plus a family bathroom. Benefits include a private garden, garage and driveway parking.

Well-presented one bedroom apartment ideal for first-time buyers or investors. The property includes an open-plan living and kitchen area, a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a modern bathroom. Located close to transport links and local amenities.

Three bedroom mid-terrace house offering spacious accommodation throughout. The ground floor features a lounge, dining room and fitted kitchen. Upstairs consists of three bedrooms and a family bathroom. The property also benefits from a rear garden and off-street parking.

Modern two bedroom apartment situated on the second floor of a well-maintained development. Features include a bright living room, fitted kitchen, two bedrooms and a contemporary bathroom. Additional benefits include allocated parking and secure entry system.

Impressive five bedroom property offering flexible living accommodation across three floors. The property includes multiple reception rooms, a high-spec kitchen, four bathrooms and a landscaped garden. Suitable for large families or those needing home office space.
